title: Refunding
body:
Do you ever get more than 3 refunds?? (Like does it ever reset?) Because I'm the type of person (I've already used 2 refunds to this :P) to refund a champion that I bought that i don't really play to buy a different one. Do you ever get more refunds or have I fucked up and only have 1 chance left? 



Also if they don't reset, it would be cool if every year it reset to 3 :) (for people like me)

replies.body:
Your account only receives 3 *refund tokens*, which are the only exception to our [**Refund Policy**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ). I'm not aware of any current plans to change this system at the moment.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I only refunded for skins and champions that had reworks/dropped price right after I bought them. I haven't had a refund in over a year and a half, so I don't think they give you any more. I would really like one if they did though...
